nodes.text: This probe droid was stationed on the Separatist planet Lola Sayu in the Citadel prison around 21 BBY at the time of the Battle of Lola Sayu.

After the elite team of clone troopers led by Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker arrived at the Citadel, planning to rescue Jedi Master Even Piell, they split up into two teams. The team, lead by Obi-Wan Kenobi, began sneaking through the Citadel's ventilation shafts when Clone Commander Cody noticed the probe droid and alerted the rest of the squad. The droid tried to escape by flying up the shaft, but Even Piell managed to catch up to it, cutting it in half with his lightsaber.
